bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Illness Sign identical with xiao bian bu tong 小便不通①, blocked urination. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry bo mu 檗木 quotes [Zhang] Yuan su 元素：黃檗之用有六：瀉膀胱龍 火，一也；利小便結，二也；除下焦濕腫，三也；痢疾先見血，四也； 臍中痛，五也；補腎不足，壯骨髓，六也 , “The usage of huang bo is sixfold: It drains dragon fire from the urinary bladder. That is the first. It opens the passage of bound urination . That is the second. It eliminates moisture swelling from the lower burner. That is the third. [It cures] the ailment of free-flux illness where blood appears first. That is the fourth. Pain in the navel. That is the fifth. It supplements kidney insufficiency and strengthens the bones and their marrow. That is the sixth”.
